newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $2.1 bln for Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $2.1 bln for Wednesday.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for Wednesday are expected to total $2.1 billion in 25 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $1.6 billion in 14 sales, with a $900 million New York City deal through Smith Barney Inc. topping the the list.
On the competitive side, 11 sales totaling $455 million are on the schedule. A $300 million Clark County School District, Nev., deal at 1130 EST is the largest.
An additional 14 sales totaling $235 million are on the possible calender, meaning underwriters have said they may price the bonds Wednesday, depending on market conditions.
